document_data.name: ''Mageshield''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''mageshield''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[shield]] wielded by the inhabitants of ancient [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: A ''mageshield'' was ovoid in shape and was decorated with engravings of white stars along the border.
document_data.Powers: The shield was enchanted to protect its wielder from [[necromantic]] [[spell]]s. Any death spells that could affect the wielder were deflected back at the caster.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a member of the [[Veiled Ones]] adventuring group, [[Corran D'Arcey]], received a ''mageshield'' from the [[baelnorn]] [[Miroden Silverblade]] to be used against the [[Cult of the Dragon]] and its leader [[Kya Mordrayn]].
